seo.title: Website Migration Service - Free Site Transfer
seo.description: We'll move your website for you. Zero downtime, no technical knowledge needed. Free migration service with full support.

hero.title: We'll move your site for you.
hero.description: No technical knowledge needed. No downtime. No stress. Just tell us where it is, and we'll handle everything.
hero.imageAlt: Person working stress-free knowing migration is handled

whatIs.title: What is migration, anyway?
whatIs.description: It's just moving your website from wherever it lives now to our servers. In plain English.

anotherHost.title: If you're on another host
anotherHost.description1: We copy all your files, databases, email settings, and everything else from your current provider to ours. Your site stays live the entire time.
anotherHost.description2: When we're done, we switch the connection so your domain points to our servers instead. Visitors won't notice a thing.

local.title: If you're building locally
local.description1: We take your local files and set them up on our live servers. We'll configure the database, make sure everything connects properly, and get your site online.
local.description2: If you need help preparing the files, we'll guide you through that too.

weHandle.title: We handle it all for you
weHandle.description: You don't need to know how any of this works. That's our job.

zeroDowntime.title: Zero downtime
zeroDowntime.description: Your site stays live during the entire migration. We test everything behind the scenes before making the switch.

everythingIncluded.title: Everything included
everythingIncluded.description: Files, databases, email accounts, SSL certificates—we move it all. Nothing gets left behind.

fastTurnaround.title: Fast turnaround
fastTurnaround.description: Most migrations finish within 24-48 hours. Complex sites might take a bit longer, but we'll let you know upfront.

whatWeNeed.title: What we'll need from you
whatWeNeed.description: Just a few pieces of information. We'll walk you through finding them if you're not sure where they are.

loginDetails.title: Your current host's login details
loginDetails.description: Control panel username and password, or FTP/SSH credentials. Don't worry if you don't know what these are—we'll help you find them.

domainAccess.title: Domain registrar access (if moving the domain)
domainAccess.description: Where you registered your domain name. We'll guide you through updating the nameservers or DNS settings.

specialConfig.title: Any special configurations (optional)
specialConfig.description: Custom settings, third-party services, or anything unique about your setup. If there's nothing special, that's totally fine.

whatWeNeed.note: If you're stuck finding any of this information, reach out. We've done this thousands of times and can help you locate everything you need.

cta.title: Ready to make the move?
cta.description: Tell us about your site and we'll get started. The whole process is free, and we'll keep you updated every step of the way.
